page.title: 11Keadby Power Station
page.content: The office block,workshops and rail sidings will remain as the local parish and district councils see as acceptable use of the levelled site, after sale,as light industry, warehouses or other commercial use. The marketing department of the Central Electricity Generating Board sell off some of the ash for use in local motorway construction. Students from Leeds University have recently conducted experiments on the growing of crops,such as potatoes and wheat,on the ash tip.They found the ash to have good capillary action allowing the water to get through to the plant when required.
